Tick 050: 📜 TREATY: The Untamed Council and The Salted Walkers sign Tribute Pact (expires tick 100)

════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
  THE CHRONICLE — Age of Ticks 1–50
════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
  The Wandering Exchange, swayed by the fervent ideology of
  community_sustains vs self_reliance, shattered its ties with The
  Bound Market, marking a schism that would echo through the ages.
  Concurrently, The Forest Bridge abandoned its allegiance to The
  Restless Gatherers, as this same dichotomy tore apart those who once
  stood united. Ursa, stalwart member of The Untamed Co., fell prey to
  the ravages of time at the Plains(2,1), her mortal coil surrendered
  to the void of starvation.
════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
  THE CHRONICLE — Age of Ticks 51–100
════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
  The Restless Gatherers were rent asunder by SCHISM, their ranks
  sundered by three factions: The Bound Sworn, who sought to establish
  rigid hierarchies; The Tidal Gatherers, who championed a more fluid
  approach to leadership; and the original Gatherers themselves,
  stalwart in their commitment to community sustenance. Meanwhile, the
  Salted Walkers suffered a similar schism as The Open Drifters broke
  away, seeking self-reliance amidst a shifting landscape.
════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

  📜  MYTH of The Restless Gatherers:
        Founded at tick 10, our people's nomadic lifestyle was shaped by the
        harsh conditions of the plains and the influence of the ancient
        travelers from the Empire of Arkon who taught us the value of trade
        and cooperation.
  📜  MYTH of The Wandering Exchange:
        Our people were founded at tick 25, and our early struggles to
        survive in the harsh wilderness of the wilds shaped us into a
        community that values resourcefulness and cooperation.
  📜  MYTH of The Forest Bridge:
        Our people were founded at tick 25, shaped by our harsh beginnings
        and the struggles of establishing a community in the unforgiving
        plains.
  📜  MYTH of The Salted Walkers:
        We were founded at tick 50, shaped by our discovery of tools and the
        harsh plains environment that demanded resourcefulness and
        cooperation from our early members.
  📜  MYTH of The Untamed Council:
        My people, the Untamed Council, were founded at tick 50 by those who
        sought to live in harmony with the untamed forces of nature, shaped
        by our ancestors' experiences among the ruins of Elyria and the
        lessons learned from the enigmatic Kael.
  📜  MYTH of The Wild Survivors:
        Our people were founded at tick 75, shaped by the harsh plains
        environment and the guiding principles of our ancestors, who
        believed that endurance was the key to survival.
  📜  MYTH of The Bound Sworn:
        Our people were founded at tick 75, shaped by the harsh coastal
        environment and the discovery of tools, which led to our focus on
        resourcefulness and self-reliance.
  📜  MYTH of The Open Drifters:
        We, the Open Drifters, originated at tick 75, shaped by the
        unforgiving seas and our ancestors' resourcefulness in scavenging
        for tools like those used by the ancient Kraelion Empire.
  📜  MYTH of The Merchant Walkers:
        The Merchant Walkers originated at tick 85, forged in the crucible
        of harsh winters and scarcity, where resourcefulness and
        adaptability became essential to survival. A prophecy foretells that
        our future greatness will be shaped by the discovery of ancient
        knowledge from the ruins of the Fallen Empire of Arinthal.
  📜  MYTH of The Open Guard:
        Our people were forged in the harsh plains and coast, shaped by the
        unforgiving environment and our ancestors' struggles to survive
        against the encroaching darkness of the Shadowhand Empire's
        collapse.
  📜  MYTH of The Sworn Bridge:
        Our people, the Sworn Bridge, were founded at tick 100 by a group of
        traders who had escaped the chaos of the fallen empire of Arkeia and
        found solace in the plains where they could live off the bounty of
        the sea.
  📜  MYTH of The Wild Council:
        Our people were founded at tick 100 by our ancestors, who fled from
        the destruction of the great empire of Kraelion after its downfall
        to the rival faction of Valtoria.

  THE CHRONICLE — Age of Ticks 101–150
════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
  As the tides of time swept across our land, The Elder Rovers broke
  from The Open Guard in the SCHISM: ⚡ SCHISM — The Elder Rovers'
  pursuit of self-reliance clashed with The Open Guard's
  community-driven ways. Meanwhile, The Wild Survivors watched as
  their kin, The Open Sworn, succumbed to the SCHISM: ⚡ SCHISM — The
  Open Sworn's yearning for leadership was at odds with the crowded
  lands that bred conflict.

════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
  THE CHRONICLE — Age of Ticks 151–200
════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
  In the tumultuous epoch of our recorded chronicles, the Wild
  Survivors, bolstered by their unyielding ferocity, successfully
  repelled The Forest Bridge invaders, their valiant endeavors
  culminating in a glorious victory that earned them 17 fallen
  comrades. Concurrently, The Wild Council and The Wild Survivors
  forged a treaty of trade, strengthening bonds between these stalwart
  factions. Meanwhile, The Salted Walkers and The Bound Sworn sealed
  their own pact, as did The Merchant Walkers with The Open Sworn.
════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

  📜  MYTH of The Wandering Exchange:
        Founded at tick 25, our people were shaped by the harsh yet fertile
        plains and coast, where trade and migration forged strong bonds
        among our kind.
  📜  MYTH of The Salted Walkers:
        We emerged at tick 50 in the vast expanse of the plains, shaped by
        our pioneering spirit and symbiotic relationship with the untamed
        wilds that provided for us.
  📜  MYTH of The Bound Sworn:
        The Bound Sworn originated at tick 75, shaped by the harsh coastal
        plains and our people's resourcefulness in harnessing the sea's
        bounty to survive against the backdrop of the Great Famine that
        ravaged the land during the era of the fallen Scoured Clan.
  📜  MYTH of The Merchant Walkers:
        Our people, the Merchant Walkers, were founded at tick 85 by those
        who sought to endure and thrive in the unforgiving wilds, shaped by
        their experiences as exiles from the fallen faction of the Order of
        the Red Hand.
  📜  MYTH of The Elder Rovers:
        Our people were founded at tick 125, shaped by the vast plains and
        our nomadic lifestyle, which taught us to respect the land and live
        in harmony with nature as we had learned from the wise elders of the
        ancient Forest Bridge.

════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
  THE CHRONICLE — Age of Ticks 201–250
════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
  The Wild Survivors, masters of unyielding ferocity, repelled The
  Forest Bridge's invaders at the gates of WAR, their relentless
  onslaught driving back the foe in disarray. Meanwhile, The Salted
  Walkers stood firm against The Open Drifters' incursion, their
  resolve forged like steel as they sent the invaders fleeing. The
  Bound Sworn emerged triumphant over the vanquished Merchant Walkers,
  now vassals to their unyielding will.
════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
  THE CHRONICLE — Age of Ticks 251–300
════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
  The Wild Survivors, valiant defenders of their realm, repelled the
  invaders known as The Forest Bridge, their ferocity unbroken. In a
  separate confrontation, The Salted Walkers emerged victorious
  against The Open Drifters, driving them back in disarray. Meanwhile,
  The Bound Sworn vanquished both The Merchant Walkers and The Salted
  Walkers, claiming dominion over the vanquished hordes.
════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

  📜  MYTH of The Bound Sworn:
        Founded at tick 75, our people's early struggles to establish trade
        routes and harness coastal resources shaped our culture of endurance
        and dependence on the sea's bounty.
  📜  MYTH of The Iron Ones:
        Founded at tick 225, our people were forged by the relentless tides
        and suffering of the Iron Ones, their resilience tempered like metal
        in fire. The prophecy speaks of a future where we'll trade with The
        Unbound Merchants, uniting our strength under a new banner.
